trans-unit.source: Represents an attachable member store for an object where attachable members are set.
trans-unit.target: 表示设置了可附加成员的对象的可附加成员存储。

trans-unit.source: This attachable member store can then be referenced with <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AttachablePropertyServices" />.
trans-unit.target: 随后可使用 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AttachablePropertyServices" /> 引用此可附加成员存储。

trans-unit.source: An attachable member is typically implemented and used as an attachable property.
trans-unit.target: 可附加成员通常是实现，使用为可附加属性。

trans-unit.source: The term "attachable member" provides for the possibility that a technology also defines a system for attachable events.
trans-unit.target: 术语"可附加成员"提供一种技术还定义了可附加事件的系统的可能性。

trans-unit.source: As an item in a property store, an attachable event stores a reference to the handler that is assigned through attachable member usage.
trans-unit.target: 作为属性存储中的项，可附加的事件存储对通过可附加成员用法分配的处理程序的引用。

trans-unit.source: An attachable event in XAML can use the same store as the attachable properties do, even if the attachable event is not truly a property to the underlying type system or as it is considered in real-world use.
trans-unit.target: 可附加的属性，即使可附加的事件不是真正的基础类型系统的属性，或者它被认定中实际使用，可在 XAML 中的附加事件可以使用相同的存储。

trans-unit.source: The destination array.
trans-unit.target: 目标数组。

trans-unit.source: The array is a generic array, should be passed undimensioned, and should have components of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier" /> and <see langword="object" />.
trans-unit.target: 该数组为泛型数组，应以无维度方式传递，并且应具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier" /> 和 <see langword="object" /> 的组件。

trans-unit.source: The source index where copying should begin.
trans-unit.target: 开始复制处的源索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies all attachable member/value pairs from this attachable member store into a destination array.
trans-unit.target: 从此可附加成员存储区中复制所有可附加成员/值对，并将它们复制到目标数组中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the count of the attachable member entries in this attachable member store.
trans-unit.target: 获取此可附加成员存储中的可附加成员条目的计数。

trans-unit.source: The integer count of entries in the store.
trans-unit.target: 存储中条目的整数计数。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type system identifier for the attachable member entry to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的可附加成员条目的 XAML 类型系统标识符。

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry for the specified attachable member from this attachable member store.
trans-unit.target: 从此可附加成员存储中移除指定可附加成员的条目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an attachable member entry for <paramref name="attachableMemberIdentifier" /> was found in the store and removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存储中找到了 <paramref name="attachableMemberIdentifier" /> 的可附加成员条目并已将其移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type system identifier for the attachable member entry to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的可附加成员条目的 XAML 类型系统标识符。

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value for the specified attachable member in the specified store.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定存储中的指定可附加成员的值。

trans-unit.source: An implementation should not throw an exception if the specific attachable member already exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果已存在特定的可附加成员，实现不应引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If a member already exists, the implementation should overwrite any existing value with `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果已存在的成员，该实现应覆盖任何现有值替换为`value`。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type system identifier for the attachable member entry to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的可附加成员条目的 XAML 类型系统标识符。

trans-unit.source: Out parameter.
trans-unit.target: 输出参数。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the destination object for the value if <c>attachableMemberIdentifier</c> exists in the store and has a value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，如果 <c>attachableMemberIdentifier</c> 存在于存储中并且具有值，则会包含该值的目标对象。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get a value for the specified attachable member in the specified store.
trans-unit.target: 尝试获取指定存储中的指定可附加成员的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an attachable member entry for <paramref name="attachableMemberIdentifier" /> was found in the store and a value was posted to <paramref name="value" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存储中找到了 <paramref name="attachableMemberIdentifier" /> 的可附加成员条目，并且值已传递到 <paramref name="value" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An implementation should not throw an exception if the specific attachable member is not located in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的可附加成员不在存储区中，实现不应引发异常。
